John -

Just noticed that you live in the Channel Islands.  Must be a neat
=
place.  I am a sometime collector of sterling and coin silver, mainly
flatw=
are, with emphasis on the early Georgian and American Colonial
and Empire p=
eriods.  One of my interests is the provincial Brit
silver, of which the Ch=
annel Islands are one of the more obscure and
collectible.  Sooooo, my off-=
the-wall question is, does old Channel
Island silver show up more often for=
 sale in the Channel Islands, or
has the majority of it been dispersed to t=
he four winds?  TIA for any
info!

NC
